text: Graham McRae (5 March 1940 â€“ 4 August 2021) was a New Zealand racing driver. He was known for his success in Formula 5000 racing. He won the Tasman Series each year from 1971 to 1973. He came in 16th place at the 1973 Indianapolis 500 and won Rookie of the Year. McRae died on 4 August 2021 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Wellington
title: Graham McRae
